description:
We are a Silicon Valley-based advanced analytics consulting firm, recognized for our expertise in Data Science, Machine Learning, and AI. Our global delivery center in India supports our mission to empower businesses with data-driven solutions.

Role Overview:
Are you passionate about tackling unstructured business challenges using cutting-edge data science and engineering? We're on the lookout for a Director, Analytics Consulting to lead and inspire a team of analytics and data engineering professionals.

Responsibilities:

Manage client relationships, foster account growth, and drive overall account management.
Dive into the latest applications of data science, machine learning, BI, and data engineering to solve complex business problems.
Scale pilots and proof-of-concepts into transformative, long-term programs that deliver continuous business value.
Collaborate with client stakeholders to understand key business questions and challenges, developing roadmaps for prioritized initiatives.
Explore opportunities with new and existing clients, collaborating with internal experts to craft compelling proposals that drive growth.
Ownership of P&L for assigned account portfolios, managing revenue and margin goals.
Requirements:

16+ years of experience delivering advanced analytics consulting services and designing/implementing large data engineering programs.
Proven experience in managing large accounts, with P&L ownership being a plus.
Ability to engage with clients at the CXO and VP/Director level, defining business problems and constructing solution approaches.
Domain knowledge in areas like Financial Services, Supply Chain, Manufacturing, or Pharma.
Familiarity with the latest open-source cloud-based tech stack.
Hands-on experience with analytic tools such as R, Python, AWS, and Databricks.
Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to work effectively with global teams.
Benefits:

Significant career development opportunities in a fast-growing and entrepreneurial environment.
Be part of a small, dynamic team with a high degree of individual responsibility.
Employment Type: Full-Time
Salary: $ 104,000.00 Per Year
